app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online. 1—SPSS statistical analysis results, 2—Blast in the NCBI for the isolation, 3—photographic record of capsule preparation and in vitro evaluation (fungi control), 4—photographic record of in vitro evaluations of pathogen activity (Reactivation of the pathogen; Virulence of strains) and 5—photographic record of in vitro system evaluations of pathogen activity.
